react/jsx-closing-bracket-location.good: // good 为了去除prettier 和 其他干扰规则禁用eslint /* eslint-disable */ ;<div> // 长度比较短时 单行书写； <Hello firstName="John" lastName="Smith" /> // 长度比较长时 多行书写； <Hello firstName="John" lastName="Smith" /> </div>
react/jsx-closing-bracket-location.bad: // bad // prettier 也会报错 ;<div> <Hello lastName="Smith" firstName="John" /> <Hello lastName="Smith" firstName="John" /> </div>

react/jsx-curly-spacing.good: // good ;<div> <Hello name={firstname} /> <Hello name={{ firstname: 'John', lastname: 'Doe' }} /> </div>
react/jsx-curly-spacing.bad: // bad ;<div> <Hello name={firstname} /> <Hello name={firstname} /> <Hello name={firstname } /> </div>

react/jsx-equals-spacing.good: // good ;<div> <Hello name={firstname} /> <Hello name /> <Hello {...props} /> </div>
react/jsx-equals-spacing.bad: // bad ;<div> <Hello name = {firstname} /> <Hello name ={firstname} /> <Hello name= {firstname} /> </div>

react/jsx-no-comment-textnodes.good: // good class Hello extends React.Component { render() { return <div>{/* empty div */}</div> } } class Hi extends React.Component { render() { return <div /* empty div */ /> } }
react/jsx-no-comment-textnodes.bad: // bad class Hello extends React.Component { render() { return <div>/* empty div */</div> } }

react/jsx-no-duplicate-props.good: // good ;<Hello name="John" />
react/jsx-no-duplicate-props.bad: // bad ;<Hello name="John" name="John" />

react/jsx-no-undef.good: // good /* eslint react/jsx-no-undef: "error" */ /* eslint import/no-unresolved: "off",prettier/prettier: "error" */ const Hello = require('./Hello') ;<Hello name="John" />
react/jsx-no-undef.bad: // bad /* eslint react/jsx-no-undef: "error" */ ;<Hello name="John" />

react/jsx-pascal-case.good: // good 注意标签的样式。自定义组件遵循PascalCase规范 /* eslint react/jsx-no-comment-textnodes: 'off' */ ;<div> <div /> // html 标签 <TestComponent /> // 自定义组件 </div>

react/jsx-tag-spacing.good: // good // 开始标签'<'后不能有空格，self-closing标签关闭前要有空格 ;<div> <App /> <input /> <Provider> dosomething </Provider> </div>
react/jsx-tag-spacing.bad: // bad ;<div> <input/> < input /> <span>abc< /span> </div>

react/jsx-uses-vars.bad: // bad // 此规则只在 no-unused-vars 开启时生效。防止jsx中有未使用的变量 /* eslint import/no-unresolved: 'off', 'no-unused-vars': 'error' */ const Hello = require('./Hello')

react/no-children-prop.good: // good ;<div> <div> Children </div> <MyComponent>Children</MyComponent> <MyComponent> <span>Child 1</span> <span>Child 2</span> </MyComponent> </div> React.createElement('div', {}, 'Children') React.createElement('div', 'Child 1', 'Child 2')
react/no-children-prop.bad: // bad ;<div> <div children="Children" /> <MyComponent children={<AnotherComponent />} /> <MyComponent children={['Child 1', 'Child 2']} /> </div> React.createElement('div', { children: 'Children' })

react/no-danger-with-children.good: // good ;<div> <div dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: 'HTML' }} /> <Hello dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: 'HTML' }} /> <div>Children</div> <Hello>Children</Hello> </div> React.createElement('div', { dangerouslySetInnerHTML: { __html: 'HTML' } }) React.createElement('Hello', { dangerouslySetInnerHTML: { __html: 'HTML' } }) React.createElement('div', {}, 'Children') React.createElement('Hello', {}, 'Children')
react/no-danger-with-children.bad: // bad ;<div> <div dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: 'HTML' }}>Children</div> <Hello dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: 'HTML' }}>Children</Hello> </div> React.createElement('div', { dangerouslySetInnerHTML: { __html: 'HTML' } }, 'Children') React.createElement('Hello', { dangerouslySetInnerHTML: { __html: 'HTML' } }, 'Children')

react/no-deprecated.good: // good import { PropTypes } from 'prop-types' ReactDOM.render(<MyComponent />, root)
react/no-deprecated.bad: // bad import React, { PropTypes } from 'react' React.render(<MyComponent />, root) React.unmountComponentAtNode(root) React.findDOMNode(this.refs.foo) React.renderToString(<MyComponent />) React.renderToStaticMarkup(<MyComponent />) React.createClass({ /* Class object */ }) const propTypes = { foo: PropTypes.bar } React.DOM.div()

react/no-did-update-set-state.good: // good class Hello extends React.Component { componentDidUpdate() { this.onUpdate(function callback(newName) { this.setState({ name: newName }) }) } render() { return <div>Hello {this.props.name}</div> } }
react/no-did-update-set-state.bad: // bad class Hello extends React.Component { componentDidUpdate() { this.setState({ name: this.props.name.toUpperCase() }) } render() { return <div>Hello {this.state.name}</div> } }

react/no-direct-mutation-state.good: // good class Hello extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { foo: 'bar' } } }
react/no-direct-mutation-state.bad: // bad class Hello extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) // Assign at instance creation time, not on a callback doSomethingAsync(() => { this.state = 'bad' }) } }

react/no-find-dom-node.bad: // bad ReactDOM.findDOMNode(this.refs.foo)

react/no-is-mounted.good: // good class Hello extends React.Component { render() { return <div onClick={this.props.handleClick}>Hello</div> } }
react/no-is-mounted.bad: // bad class Hello extends React.Component { handleClick() { setTimeout(function() { if (this.isMounted()) { return 2 } }) } render() { return <div onClick={this.handleClick.bind(this)}>Hello</div> } }

react/no-redundant-should-component-upda.good: // good class Foo extends React.Component { shouldComponentUpdate() { // do check } render() { return <div>Radical!</div> } } class Qux extends React.PureComponent { render() { return <div>Tubular!</div> } }
react/no-redundant-should-component-upda.bad: // bad class Foo extends React.PureComponent { shouldComponentUpdate() { // do check } render() { return <div>Radical!</div> } } function Bar() { return class Baz extends React.PureComponent { shouldComponentUpdate() { // do check } render() { return <div>Groovy!</div> } } }

react/no-render-return-value.good: // good ReactDOM.render(<App ref={doSomethingWithInst} />, document.body) ReactDOM.render(<App />, document.body, doSomethingWithInst)
react/no-render-return-value.bad: // bad const inst = ReactDOM.render(<App />, document.body)

react/no-string-refs.good: // good 使用回调函数设置 ref class Hello extends React.Component { componentDidMount() { const component = this.hello // ...do something with component } render() { return ( <div ref={(c) => { this.hello = c }} > Hello, world. </div> ) } }
react/no-string-refs.bad: // bad 禁止设置字符串ref\ class Hello extends React.Component { render() { return <div ref="hello">Hello, world.</div> } }

react/no-typos.bad: // bad React组件相关的静态类属性和生命周期方法不能有拼写错误 class MyComponent extends React.Component { static PropTypes = {} } class c2 extends React.Component { componentdidupdate() {} }

react/no-unescaped-entities.bad: // bad ;<div> <MyComponent name="name" type="string" foo="bar"> {/* oops! */} x="y"> Body T </MyComponent> <MyComponent>{'Text'}}</MyComponent> </div>

react/no-unknown-property.good: // good const React = require('react') const Hello = <div className="hello">Hello World</div>
react/no-unknown-property.bad: // bad const React = require('react') const Hello = <div class="hello">Hello World</div>

react/no-will-update-set-state.bad: // bad //React 16.3 后将会废弃 // componentWillMount、 // componentWillReceiveProps、 // componentWillUpdate三个周期函数， // 新增 getDerivedStateFromProps 和 getSnapshotBeforeUpdate 两个周期函数

react/prefer-es6-class.good: // good class Hello extends React.Component { render() { return <div>Hello {this.props.name}</div> } }
react/prefer-es6-class.bad: // bad const Hello = createReactClass({ render() { return <div>Hello {this.props.name}</div> } })

react/require-render-return.good: // good class Hello extends React.Component { render() { return <div>Hello</div> } }
react/require-render-return.bad: // bad class Hello extends React.Component { render() { <div>Hello</div> } }

react/sort-comp.good: // good 遵循以下顺序 // 1.静态方法和属性 // 2.生命周期方法 // 3.自定义方法 // 4.render class Hello extends React.Component { displayName: 'Hello' render() { return <div>Hello</div> } }
react/sort-comp.bad: // bad class Hello extends React.Component { render() { return <div>Hello</div> } displayName: 'Hello' }

react/style-prop-object.good: // good ;<div style={{ color: 'red' }} /> React.createElement('div', { style: { color: 'red' } })
react/style-prop-object.bad: // bad ;<div> <div style="color: 'red'" /> <div style={true} /> </div> React.createElement('div', { style: "color: 'red'" }) React.createElement('div', { style: true })
